roleset.name: speak with
roleset.note: INTERVIEW-V NOTES: Member of Vncls interrogate-37.1.3. (from interview.01-v)
INTERVIEW-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls interrogate-37.1.3. (from interview.01-n)

roles.note: Some forms, such as "interview with __" are ambiguous between arg1 and arg0. The form seems to be used more often with arg1 than arg0, however, so default to arg1 when unsure. Instances with arg0 usually involve well known interviewers or news agencies. (from interview.01-n)

role.descr: purpose or subject matter of interview
